title: Supreme Court Stops Trump From Ending DACA
itunes:title: Supreme Court Stops Trump From Ending DACA
description:
Leon Fresco, a partner at Holland & Knight, discusses how a divided Supreme Court dealt a rebuke to President Donald Trump, blocking him from ending the Obama-era program that shields 670,000 young undocumented immigrants from deportation and lets them seek jobs. June Grasso hosts.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
